Entries.Mon: Haley and I were sisters... it was strange, given how different we were, but I still really loved her.
Entries.Mon6: It's lonely without Haley around. Even if she didn't contribute around the house much, it was at least nice seeing her face.$s
Entries.Wed6: Now that Haley's gone I've had a much easier time keeping things in order. It's weird... I miss having to clean up her messes.
Entries.summer_Mon: Haley was always a picky eater... it made cooking for her hard, but I miss doing it.
Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Haley: Haley was always a picky eater... it made cooking for her hard, but I miss doing it.
Entries.winter_Sun6: My sister and I would always fight a lot... but I miss her so much.$s#$e#She was a wonderful person...$s#$e#Anyways... is there anything you want to talk about?
Entries.winter_Sun6_inlaw_Haley: My sister and I would always fight a lot... but I miss her so much.$s#$e#She was a wonderful person...$s#$e#Anyways... is there anything you want to talk about?
Entries.winter_Wed: It was such a hassle keeping this house clean when Haley was living here. Not so much anymore...$s#$e#I guess I just have to deal with it.$s#$e#Your farmhouse seems nice and cozy, at least.$h

Entries.winter_11.000: Most of us visit the hospital for a yearly check-up.
Entries.winter_11.001: Umm... if it's not too much trouble, I'd like to go with the 'natural remedy', if possible.

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: Unlike Gus, Magnus seems to have everything well-organized here!$h
